text: Kirk Bondad, (born on June 7, 1997 in Germany), is a German Filipino model in the Philippines, who won the Mister World Philippines 2024 in the Philippines. He is also as one of the top models in the Century Tuna Bud 2022.https://www.abs-cbn.com/entertainment/showbiz/events/2024/11/22/kirk- bondad-honors-igorot-roots-in-mr-world-national-costume-competition-1357 ==Personal life== He was born and raised in Germany to the German father and the Filipino mother, and moved to the Philippines along with his brother Clint Bondad.https://www.gmanetwork.com/entertainment/celebritylife/news/117830/kirk- bondad-admits-that-things-didnt-go-as-planned-after-top-20-finish-in-mister- world/story ==Mister World== In 2024 he is one of the contestant in Mister World 2024, Top 20 finalists and the Mister World Philippines 2024 winner.https://www.gmanetwork.com/entertainment/showbiznews/news/117813/kirk- bondad-finishes-in-the-top-20-puerto-rico-bags-mr-world-2024-title/story ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:German people Category:Filipino people Category:German models Category:Filipino models
title: Kirk Bondad
